tool_description:
Obfuscate words with this simple Unicode Codex.

It is very simple to use, and works with words and sentences.

We hope you enjoy it, let us know where you put it to use.
name: Unicode Obfuscator
title: Unicode Obfuscator

api_list.name: Obfuscate
api_list.description: Takes a word as parameter obfuscates it using a proprietary Unicode Character codex
